!Series_title	"Molecular, Spatial and Functional Single-Cell Profiling of the Hypothalamic Preoptic Region"
!Series_geo_accession	"GSE113576"
!Series_status	"Public on Nov 01 2018"
!Series_submission_date	"Apr 24 2018"
!Series_last_update_date	"Mar 25 2019"
!Series_pubmed_id	"30385464"
!Series_summary	"Single-cell RNA sequencing of ~31,000 cells dissociated and captured from the preoptic region of the hypothalamus from multiple male and female mice"
!Series_overall_design	"Three replicates each of male and female mice"
!Series_type	"Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing"
!Series_contributor	"Xiaowei,,Zhuang"

!Sample_extract_protocol_ch1	"The preoptic region of the hypothalamus was dissected from freshly prepared brains, dissociated into individual cells via protease treatement, FACS sorted to enrich live cells, and then prepared using the 10X Chromium protocols." "The preoptic region of the hypothalamus was dissected from freshly prepared brains, dissociated into individual cells via protease treatement, FACS sorted to enrich live cells, and then prepared using the 10X Chromium protocols."

!Sample_data_processing	"barcodes.tsv contains the name associated with each cell for all samples.
